title: Hide login icon while keeping authentication functional

requirements.text: Hide the login icon/button from the SiteHeader component while preserving all Internet Identity authentication functionality in the background

quotes: just hide the icon while keeping the authentication system

acceptanceCriteria: The LoginButton component is not visible in the site header
Internet Identity authentication continues to work in the background
Admin functionality remains accessible for authenticated admin users
No authentication-related errors occur from hiding the UI element

constraints: Do not remove or modify the Internet Identity authentication system
Do not change the LoginButton component implementation itself
Do not modify admin access control logic or authorization checks
Preserve all authentication hooks and backend integration
nonGoals: Removing the Internet Identity authentication system
